meta-description: Hesperides University is a leading academic institution committed to providing high-quality education that keeps pace with global developments, with a focus on scientific research and sustainable social impact. We believe in the importance of innovation, continuous development, and sustainability in building an outstanding academic future. We are dedicated to preparing leaders and innovators who contribute to the advancement of society.

data_not_found_description: Oops! Looks like this Data is missing.
legal_advice_description: You can request legal advice from a lawyer here. The service is free and your identity is hidden. No registration is required. Ask your legal question and get a free answer from one of the lawyers through the Q&A section, live chat, or by phone. Just choose the method that suits you.
legal_advice_description-lawyers1: You can submit a Request for Quotation (RFQ) through the Legal Advice Middle East website to participating lawyers and receive quotes from them to choose from. You can then accept any offer you receive and hire the lawyer you selected by paying their fee online.
legal_advice_description-lawyers2: You will need to pay a small refundable amount to prove the seriousness of your request before sending your RFQ to the lawyers. You can later use this amount to pay the lawyer’s fee or request a refund if, for any reason, you receive fewer than three quotations from lawyers within the specified period (five working days).

request-price-offer.title: Request for Price Offer
request-price-offer.getQuotesQualifiedLawyers: Get price quotations from qualified lawyers
request-price-offer.submitRequestGetOffersDescription: Submit your request to receive price quotations and get multiple competitive offers from qualified lawyers. Save time and money. Review the offers and compare the lawyers’ experience, fees, and specialties to ensure you hire the right lawyer for the legal service you need.
request-price-offer.serviceHelpDescription: This service will help you quickly and easily find the right lawyer by allowing you to receive quotations from lawyers in our network. Simply describe your legal needs, submit your request, and start receiving offers from lawyers interested in providing the service you requested.
request-price-offer.quotationGuaranteeDescription: We guarantee that you will receive at least three offers from different lawyers within five business days. In most cases, you’ll receive the first quotation within one or two business days, but if your request is not overly complex, you can expect to receive it the same day.
request-price-offer.lawyerCannotSubmitRequest: The lawyer cannot submit a request
request-price-offer.fixed_cost_services_description: Get the best value with our fixed-cost services, with no surprises

service.quotationGuaranteeDescription: We guarantee that you will receive at least three offers from different lawyers within five business days.
